Cart A is moving to the left with speed $v_1$ and Cart B is moving to the right with speed $v_2$.

Each bullet hits the target when the next bullet has already been fired. Assume that the speeds of the two carts are not affected by the firing of the bullets. The distance between two adjacent bullets in the air is $s$.

The speed of each bullet relative to the ground remains constant at $v_0$. Each bullet hits the target when the next bullet has already been fired. The distance between two adjacent bullets in the air is $s$.
